name: part_014
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage2 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [qBwpM98PXcI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora concludes her performance with a heartfelt message to her fans, expressing gratitude for their ongoing support and excitement for the festival.
Tokino Sora performs 'Ano Sora no Mukou'.
A transition period filled with crowd cheers and background music as the stage prepares for the next performer.
Kobo Kanaeru takes the stage and performs her energetic song 'HELP!!', accompanied by thematic on-screen text highlights.

subtitles.original: ...毎回来てくれて
subtitles.english: ...for coming every time.

subtitles.original: みんなの応援が聞こえて、とっても嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: Hearing everyone's support makes me so happy!

subtitles.original: 私も、みんなの気持ちに応えられるように頑張るから
subtitles.english: I'll also do my best to live up to everyone's feelings,

subtitles.original: 最後まで、最高のフェスになるように
subtitles.english: so that it stays the best festival until the very end,

subtitles.original: みんなも盛り上がってほしいぞー！
subtitles.english: I want everyone to get hyped up too!

subtitles.original: あの空の向こう 向こう 向こうの未来
subtitles.english: Beyond that sky, beyond, beyond the future,

subtitles.original: 夢の続きを
subtitles.english: the continuation of the dream.

subtitles.original: ゆっくり走れ 腕で 体を使って
subtitles.english: Run slowly, with your arms, using your body,

subtitles.original: 前に進もう
subtitles.english: let's move forward.

subtitles.original: ゆっくり走れ 走れ 道に迷った
subtitles.english: Run slowly, run, when you lose your way,

subtitles.original: 時がチャンスだ
subtitles.english: that's your chance.

subtitles.original: 何もない もない 新しい僕が
subtitles.english: When there's nothing, nothing, a new me

subtitles.original: 見つかるはずさ
subtitles.english: is sure to be found.

subtitles.original: できないことばかり見えてくるくるいつも遠回り
subtitles.english: Seeing only the things I can't do, always taking detours.

subtitles.original: だけど昨日よりは明日が見えるから大丈夫
subtitles.english: But since I can see tomorrow better than yesterday, I'm okay.

subtitles.original: 女神
subtitles.english: Goddess

subtitles.original: 聖女
subtitles.english: Saint

subtitles.original: 聡明
subtitles.english: Wisdom

subtitles.original: 慈愛
subtitles.english: Affection

subtitles.original: 博愛
subtitles.english: Philanthropy

subtitles.original: 女神？聖女？聡明？慈愛？博愛？ですわ！
subtitles.english: Goddess? Saint? Wisdom? Affection? Philanthropy? It's me!

subtitles.original: あたしなんてったってお姫様 この現世に送るヒロイン
subtitles.english: After all, I'm a princess. The heroine sent to this world.

subtitles.original: 一生暇もといイージーモードって思ったら勝手にどうぞ
subtitles.english: If you think life is just leisure, or rather easy mode, then go ahead.

subtitles.original: 世間はいつも風向き次第 有象無象ばっかりで本当
subtitles.english: The world always goes with the wind. It's truly full of nobodies.

subtitles.original: 人間不信になっちゃう！
subtitles.english: I'm losing faith in humanity!

subtitles.original: 気づいたのこの世界に情も涙もないこと
subtitles.english: I've realized there's no compassion or tears in this world.

subtitles.original: あれもダメ これもダメ それもダメ どれもダメ
subtitles.english: That's no good, this is no good, that's no good, nothing's no good.

subtitles.original: 現実は世知辛い
subtitles.english: Reality is harsh.

subtitles.original: 全部大変ですわ！
subtitles.english: Everything is so hard!

subtitles.original: あたしなんてったってお姫様 この現世に送るヒロイン
subtitles.english: After all, I'm a princess. The heroine sent to this world.

subtitles.original: 楽しいシナリオ混ぜ全部全部書き換えちゃうの
subtitles.english: I'll mix in a fun scenario and rewrite everything.

subtitles.original: だってだってお姫様 自分様の物語くらいは
subtitles.english: Because, after all, I'm a princess. For my own story at least...

subtitles.original: キラキラ楽しまなきゃですわ！ですわ！ですわ！
subtitles.english: ...I have to enjoy it sparklingly! I do! I do!

subtitles.original: 今に見てなさい 運命なんて大変修正し差し上げますわ
subtitles.english: Just you watch. I'll majorly fix that thing called fate for you.

subtitles.original: 誰？誰？誰誰誰？ 裏で糸を引いてるのは誰？
subtitles.english: Who? Who? Who, who, who? Who is pulling the strings from behind?

subtitles.original: 操り人形だなんて ごめんだわ！
subtitles.english: I'm not going to be some puppet!

subtitles.original: 澄まし顔してても 黒幕はあの人かも
subtitles.english: Even if they look calm, that person might be the mastermind.

subtitles.original: まずはあたしが強くならなきゃ 未来は変わらない
subtitles.english: First, I have to become strong, or the future won't change.

subtitles.original: 自分改革ですわ！
subtitles.english: It's time for self-reform!

subtitles.original: そうよなんてったってお姫様 あたしこそ最高演出家
subtitles.english: That's right, after all, I'm a princess. I am the best director.

subtitles.original: 今日からの全ての主導権はこちらにあるわ
subtitles.english: From today, I hold all the initiative.

subtitles.original: だってだってお姫様 自分様で決めたことくらいは
subtitles.english: Because, after all, I'm a princess. For the things I decided myself...

subtitles.original: 我がままに生きなきゃですわ！ですわ！ですわ！
subtitles.english: ...I have to live selfishly! I do! I do!

subtitles.original: 女神 聖女 聡明 慈愛 博愛 ですわ！
subtitles.english: Goddess, Saint, Wisdom, Affection, Philanthropy! It's me!

subtitles.original: みんな、コボ姫って言ってー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, say Kobo-hime!

subtitles.original: 今日も自分勝手にエスコート 運命の針が踊り出す
subtitles.english: Escorting selfishly again today. The needle of fate starts to dance.

subtitles.original: 顔をあげたその時 ほら世界が恋をする
subtitles.english: When I lift my face, look, the world falls in love.

subtitles.original: あたしハッピーエンドプリンセス この現世に送るヒロイン
subtitles.english: I am the happy-ending princess. The heroine sent to this world.

subtitles.original: すったもんだある日々も全部全部愛して見せるの
subtitles.english: Even the days of trouble, I'll show you I can love them all.

subtitles.original: ハッピーエンドプリンセス 自分様の物語くらいは
subtitles.english: Happy-ending princess. For my own story at least...

subtitles.original: キラキラ楽しまなきゃですわ！ですわ！ですわ！
subtitles.english: ...I have to enjoy it sparklingly! I do! I do!

subtitles.original: 艶っぽく生きなきゃですわ！ですわ！ですわ！
subtitles.english: ...I have to live fascinatingly! I do! I do!

subtitles.original: 今に見てなさい 運命なんて大変修正し差し上げますわ
subtitles.english: Just you watch. I'll majorly fix that thing called fate for you.

subtitles.original: 女神
subtitles.english: Goddess

subtitles.original: 聖女
subtitles.english: Saint

subtitles.original: 聡明
subtitles.english: Wisdom

subtitles.original: 慈愛
subtitles.english: Affection

subtitles.original: 博愛
subtitles.english: Philanthropy

subtitles.original: ですわ！
subtitles.english: It's me!
